# Class LLMChatRequestData

Class for handling chat messages in graphs. Extends BaseData with chat message-specific functionality.

##### Index

### Methods

destroy getLLMChatRequest

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources used by the LLMChatRequest instance.

#### Returns void

Overrides BaseData.destroy




### getLLMChatRequest

  * getLLMChatRequest(): [LLMChatRequestInterface](/interfaces/common_data_types_external_llm_chat_request_data.LLMChatRequestInterface)

Gets the LLMChatRequest data as an interface. If external is set, it will parse the external reference, else it will use the stored properties

#### Returns [LLMChatRequestInterface](/interfaces/common_data_types_external_llm_chat_request_data.LLMChatRequestInterface)

The LLMChatRequest interface object
